div.bibl: Russkaya Pochta (Russian Post), Sept. 14, 1917. LECTURE BY THE 'ENLIGHTENMENT SOCIETY'

body.p: "The Bolsheviks and their Attitude Towards War" will be the theme of a lecture to be given under the sponsorship of the "Enlightenment Society" on September 30, 1917, at the school building, 1206 N. Hoyne Avenue. The lecturer will be Mr. U. Wulbert.
The lecture will begin at 8 P. M.; free discussion will follow it.
